vote.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for the purchase of general and sewer hoses, repair clamps, parts, and accessories for the Water Utilities Department - Powerseal Pipeline Products Corporation in the estimated amount of $106,000.00, 4-Star Hose & Supply, Inc. in the estimated amount of $94,748.44, Core & Main LP in the estimated amount of $40,000.00, and Texas Pack and Loader Sales, Inc. dba Texas Pack + Load in the estimated amount of $5,000.00, lowest responsible bidders of four - Total estimated amount of $245,748.44 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund
